question: What are the top 5 most luxurious train journeys in the world and generate an image of the most luxurious one?

steps.content: What are the top 5 most luxurious train journeys in the world and generate an image of the most luxurious one?
Plan: 1) Search for the top 5 most luxurious train journeys in the world. 2) Identify the most luxurious one. 3) Generate an image of the most luxurious train. 4) Return the answer.
Searching for the top 5 most luxurious train journeys in the world.

The top 5 most luxurious train journeys are: 1) The Venice Simplon-Orient-Express, Europe. 2) The Maharajas' Express, India. 3) The Royal Scotsman, Scotland. 4) The Blue Train, South Africa. 5) The Rocky Mountaineer, Canada.
The Venice Simplon-Orient-Express is often considered the most luxurious. Proceed to generate an image of it.
Generating an image of the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express.
Image of the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express generated.
Can you provide some details about the amenities on the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express?
Plan: 1) Search for details about the amenities on the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for amenities on the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express.
The Venice Simplon-Orient-Express offers luxurious cabins, fine dining with gourmet meals, a bar car with live piano music, and personalized service.
